label: 大久保一翁
本: The Meiji Restoration . Stanford University Press . 1972
見出し読み: おおくぼ いちおう
説明文: (1817-88). Also: Tadahiro. Hatamoto and Bakufu official; Metsuke, Kanjo-bugyo, Gaikoku-bugyo. Associate of reformers, including Iwase Tadanari and Katsu Awa. With latter, took part in arranging surrender of Edo, 1868. Later served in Meiji bureaucracy, notably as prefectural governor.
